name: io.github.riza-io/riza-mcp
description: The Riza MCP server wraps the Riza API and presents endpoints as individual tools for LLM-generated code execution and management.

environment_variables.name: RIZA_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for authenticating with Riza API

tools.name: create_tool
tools.description: Your LLM can write code and save it as a tool using the Riza Tools API.

tools.name: fetch_tool
tools.description: Your LLM can fetch saved Riza tools, including source code, useful for editing tools.

tools.name: execute_tool
tools.description: Executes a saved tool securely on Riza's code interpreter API.

tools.name: execute_code
tools.description: Executes arbitrary code safely on Riza's code interpreter API, without saving it as a tool.
